alert.note: Alert for Taiya Inlet and Klondike Highway (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 03 at 7:46PM AKST until January 04 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AKST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Northeast winds 30 to 45 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...The Klondike Highway. * WHEN...Until noon AKST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Wind chills as low as 50 below zero early Tuesday will cause rapid frostbite on exposed skin. Coldest values will occur near White Pass. Recent snow combined with blustery winds could further hamper travel with reduced visibility in blowing snow. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A high wind warning means a hazardous high wind event is expected or occurring.&&
